title: The Abyss Special Edition (1989) 2-Discs PAL DVD9
description:
The Abyss Special Edition (1989) 2-Discs
----------------------------------------
"Deep below the blue surface, there lies a place no one has ever dreamed of....."

IMDB: <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096754/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096754/</a>

Audio: English (5.1)

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Icelandic, Czech, English, Magyar, Polish, Portuguese, Arabic

Extra Materials:
- Disk 1:
  - Theatrical Version.
  - Special Edition.
- Disk 2:
  - Personnel Lockers.
  - Trailers:
    - The Abyss Teaser Trailer.
    - The Abyss Main Trailer.
    - The Abyss Reviews Trailer.
  - Documentaries:
    - The Abyss Featurette.
    - "Under Pressure": Making The Abyss.
  - Imaging Station:
    - Pseudopod Multi-Angle.
    - Deepcore Timelapse.
    - Videomatics Montage.
    - Montana Bridge Flooding.
    - Engine Room Flooding.
    - Surface Shoot Montage.
    - Crane Crash Shoot.
    - Visual Effects Reel.
    - Miniature Rear-Projection.
    - Motion Control Timelapse.
    - Shooting Script.
    - Original Treatment.



Plot outline:
An American nuclear submarine is attacked (during the cold war) and crashes underwater. The navy asks the workers of a nearby underwater oil rig who are joined by a number of navy SEALS to locate and investigate the cause of the crash. As the crew embark on their mission, they encounter a number of difficulties and discover that they may not be alone. There is something else down there.
